content.prompt:
© Brooklyn Museum/Corbis

The sculptor who created the figure shown carved the body with bent knees so it could

choices.label: sit atop a cylindrical bark container filled with ancestral relics
adorn the entryway to a warrior’s shrine
sit on the back of the Fang king’s headdress
take a deceased family member’s place at a table

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Explain how and/or why context influences artistic decisions about form, style, materials, content, and/or function in the creation or meaning of a work of art (or group of related works of art).
